title: Redesign User & Admin homepages to match uploaded reference layout with bordered section grouping

requirements.text: Update the User dashboard homepage layout to match the uploaded reference image (IMG_20260206_123940-2.jpg): keep the same colors/icons/logo style, but wrap the three KPI cards (Total Due, Total Work, Total Taken) inside a single shared bordered container, while preserving the KPI values and calculations.

quotes:
(মোট পাওনা, মোট কাজ, মোট নেওয়া)–এ
এই তিনটি সেকশন একটি বর্ডারের ভিতরে

acceptanceCriteria: On the User dashboard home view, the three KPI cards render together inside one shared container with a visible border and rounded corners (not three independent bordered blocks).
The KPI numbers shown remain unchanged from current behavior (same data source and calculations).
The overall visual style (colors/typography/rounded corners/shadows) remains consistent with the uploaded reference image.

requirements.text: Update the User dashboard homepage action tiles to match the uploaded reference image layout and styling: display Production, Work, and Nasta tiles in one row (3 columns), and display Payment/Loan as a single tile on the next row aligned to the left; ensure each tile has a clear rounded border and shadow consistent with the reference, without changing what each tile does.

quotes: নিচের যে সেকশনগুলো আছে লোন পেমেন্ট এসব গুলা একটি একটি রাউন্ডের ভিতরে থাকবে আর প্রত্যেকটি সেকশনের অর্ডার দিয়ে দিবে

acceptanceCriteria: User dashboard home action tiles are arranged as 3 tiles in the first row and 1 tile in the second row aligned left (matching the reference screenshot layout).
Each action tile has a rounded container with a visible border and consistent shadow treatment.
Clicking each tile still navigates to the same existing views as before (Production, Work, Payment history views, etc.).

requirements.text: Update the Admin dashboard homepage to use the same design language as the User homepage and the uploaded reference image: the top totals area should use the same KPI layout (1 full-width card + 2 half-width cards) and those three KPI cards must also be wrapped inside a single shared bordered container; keep the same totals and computations currently shown in admin summary.

quotes: সেম ডিজাইন ইউজার এডমিন দোনো জায়গায় এপ্লাই হবে

acceptanceCriteria: Admin dashboard 'dashboard' view shows the same KPI layout style as the User dashboard (1 wide card + 2 half cards).
The three admin KPI cards are inside one shared bordered container with rounded corners.
Admin totals values remain correct and based on the same underlying stored account data as before.

requirements.text: Reorganize and style the Admin dashboard homepage menu tiles so that sections are visually grouped and ordered with bordered/rounded group containers consistent with the reference style: group money-related actions together, group work-related actions together, and group settings-related actions together; do not add any new screens and do not change what any tile navigates to.

quotes: টাকার সেকশন গুলা আছে এগুলা একপাশে রাখবে সেটিংসের গুলো এক পাশে রাখবে কাজের সেকশনগুলো রাখবে

acceptanceCriteria: Admin dashboard menu tiles are grouped into clearly separated visual groups (each group has its own rounded border container).
Existing admin navigation destinations remain unchanged for each tile (Production, Work, Nasta, Payment/Loan, Company Report, Final Balance, Requests, Settings, Worker Rate Settings).

requirements.text: Ensure the overall screen/frame border and per-section borders are consistent across both User and Admin homepages (including a clear outer screen border and per-group borders), matching the reference image’s emphasis on bordered sections, while keeping all existing functionality intact.

quotes: পুরা স্কিনে চারপাশে একটা বর্ডার দিয়ে

acceptanceCriteria: Both User and Admin homepages show a clear outer frame border around the main content area.
Each grouped area (KPIs container and action group containers) has a visible border and rounded corners consistent with the reference image.
No functional regressions: login, logout, navigation, and all existing data displays/actions still work as before.

constraints: Do not add any additional screens beyond the existing ones.
Do not change existing business logic/data calculations; this is a UI layout/styling update only.
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only components must be composed, not edited).
Keep all existing navigation targets and actions for tiles/buttons unchanged.
nonGoals: Adding new admin/user features beyond layout/styling changes.
Changing the app’s language/content text (e.g., Bengali labels) unless required for layout.
Backend schema or Motoko actor changes.
